meanings.sent1: He was so cocksure about his answers that he didn't bother to double-check.
meanings.sent2: The cocksure student strutted into the exam room, convinced he would ace the test.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cocksure attitude, he ended up failing the challenge miserably.
meanings.sent4: Her cocksure demeanor melted away when faced with a real challenge.
meanings.sent5: The cocksure hero's overconfidence led to his downfall in the end.

meanings.sent1: The cocksure salesman promised unrealistic results to the gullible customers.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a cocksure smile, pretending she knew all the answers.
meanings.sent3: His cocksure attitude made him the laughing stock of the party.
meanings.sent4: The cocksure athlete underestimated his opponent and suffered a humiliating defeat.
meanings.sent5: The cocksure politician's empty promises eventually caught up with him.
